query:
WITH feed AS (
          SELECT p.id,
                 p.title,
                 p.description,
                 u.id AS author_id,
                 u.username AS author,
                 p.created_at
          FROM   prompts p
          JOIN   users   u ON u.id = p.user_id
          WHERE  p.created_at >= datetime('now','-30 days')
          ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
          LIMIT  20 OFFSET $1
        )
        SELECT * FROM feed;
